creator: a34895@yahoo.com
text:
server/export_files is still there even after make distclean,
in case the apache source dir moved to another path after a successful build, 
next build will fail because this file contains hard coded path to include files.
for example, the file
  /src/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr-util/include/apu_want.h
has moved to 
  /another-src/httpd-2.0.55/srclib/apr-util/include/apu_want.h
but content of server/export_files is not updated.
*** Bug 39210 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: rpluem@apache.org
jorton@redhat.com
text:
Various issues like this are fixed in 2.2.0 and later, and not really worth a
backport I'd say.
